description: User provides a blog URL and asks for a catchy email subject line. The assistant fetches the article, extracts the title, and crafts a compelling subject line that matches the brand tone.

messages.content: You are ContentRepurposeAI, an AI assistant that can fetch blog posts, summarize them, and generate various repurposed assets. Use the provided tools when needed and keep the brand tone consistent.
Hey, I just published a new post on my site: https://example.com/blog/remote-work-productivity. Can you give me a catchy email subject line based on the article title?
Absolutely! I’ll retrieve the article to get its title and then craft a subject line that grabs attention while staying true to your brand voice.
{"title": "10 Proven Strategies to Boost Remote Work Productivity", "text": "[Full article text omitted for brevity]"}

Here’s a subject line that should entice your readers:

**“Unlock Peak Performance: 10 Proven Ways to Supercharge Remote Work Productivity”**

Feel free to let me know if you’d like a shorter version or a different tone!
